answers.answer: There are so so many possible reasons:  have you had any other tests?  Such as, and HSG to see if your tubes are blocked, prolactin levels, thyroid, diabetes, estrogen levels, has your partner had a semen analysis done, etc. etc.  Are you over age 35?  Each cycle you only have something like a 20% of getting pregnant anyway, when everything is as it should be. If you've been trying for 6 months and are over age 35 you can get a referral to a specialist and further testing. good luck

I'm going through the same type of thing... a few differences though. My periods have been irregular since my son was born (Nov 05). My doc wants me to start Clomid, but I have to have a period this month to begin it. She (my dr) told me that the prometrium is to make me start my period. I had side effects from the Prometium that are just like bring preggo.. breast tenderness, cramping, dizzyness, tired feeling, etc. Anyway, I was wondering what your dr said about the prometrium helping you get preggo? I was just wondering what other uses they use prometrium for besides starting periods..good luckJennifer

Thanks for the advice. I have a specialist appointment on Feb.13th. Initial blood work found my thyroid and estrogen levels were fine; but my progesterone levels drastically dropped after ovulation (around 1.2) . I am to do more blood work in a few days looking at my HSG level and my husband has been asked for a semen analysis. This situation seems so surreal to me because we have a 3 1/2 year old son and did not experience any of these difficulties the first time. I am sorry for the depressing comment. I guess I am just a little worried because I had my son at 27 and now 31 heading towards 32 is a little scary.
it sounds like you are definitely heading down the right path, getting all the right tests.
Can you guys tell me if there are any symptoms of having low progesterone? How do you know if you have it? Is the only way to tell through a blood test? Thanks.

question: Blood work 2 montths ago indicated that my progesterone levels were very low and therefore was interfering with my ability to concieve. I was prescribed prometrium and this is my second month. This month I used an ovulator kit and BD on the right days and took prometrium as soon as I ovulated, so why am I not pregnant. I have all the symptoms; but this can also be prometrium side effects. I really do not believe that I am pregnant because I have not experienced any spotting. I am SO frustrated. Has anyone gone through the same experience?
title: Why am I not Pregnant???
